name: Loot or Shoot - GameDevHQ Filebase Game Jam
name_original: Loot or Shoot - GameDevHQ Filebase Game Jam
description:
In the dark future of 1999, there is only LOOT OR SHOOT, where contestant battle against merciless killbots for wild guns and fabulous prizes. Will you thrive or will you die?

Controls

WASD for movement

Shift to Run

Mouse Button 1 to fire.

E to interact

Known issues:

-Added more bugs to fix later.
